definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: piece (Targum; v. BH [[קרץ]]);—pl. sf. [[קַרְח֫וֹהִי]] Da 6:25, [[חֵיהוֹן]]- Da 3:8, both in phr. ´[[אֲכַ֫לוּ ק]]:, i.e. accuse maliciously (so Targum Syr. PS:3756 (cf. OAram. ´[[אמר כרחי פ]]: Lzb:299 SAC:66 Cooke:205 f.; [[כרץ]] also Mand.), prob. borrowed from As. karṣe akâlu, malign, slander (oft.; also TelAm.); cf. also uḳtarrizu Ḫamm:Law 161; further Ar. 0’akala lah.mahu id., and kindred phr.; Eth. bali0: 3ga: Di:489).
